org.jepria.versionizer.vcs

Interface VCSFacade

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserManualGit, UserManualSvn

    public interface VCSFacade
    Facade for Version Control System API for the particular module

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Commit changes (git push) and disconnect from remote.
      void commit(java.lang.String commitMessage)
      Do regular commit with a message
      void commitVersion(java.lang.String versionTag)
      Do a version commit (contains nothing but version)
      java.util.List<CommitFacade> getCommitsSinceLastVersion() 
      CommitParser newCommitParser() 
      void open()
      Connect to the remote, prepare and synchronize (git pull or svn update)

      • close

        void close()
        Commit changes (git push) and disconnect from remote.
        Process invocations correctly even if open() failed or has not been invoked at all.
